text: @Mike_Pence @TrumpWarRoom Hypocrite Mike Pence criticizes abortion, says supports the lives of unborn. Why doesn’t he support lives of born, seniors being killed daily by his boss’ reckless COVID policies, lack thereof, early denials of virus, refusal to wear mask .#COVID19  #TrumpIsNotWell #Biden2020
